class Main {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        ExecutorService service = Executors.newCachedThreadPool();

                SingleTon.getInstance();
            });

class SingleTon {

        System.out.println("ì‹±ê¸€í†¤ ì¸ìŠ¤í„´ìŠ¤ ìƒì„±");

            return new SingleTon();

        return instance;

}

import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
import java.util.concurrent.Executors;

class Main {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        ExecutorService service = Executors.newCachedThreadPool();

        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {

                SingleTon.getInstance();
            });
        }

        service.shutdown();
    }
}

    private static class LazyHolder {

}

class Super {

}
class One {
    static { System.out.println("One Init"); }
}
class Two extends Super {
    static { System.out.println("Two Init"); }
}
class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        One o = null;
        Two t = new Two();
    }
}

ë¶€ëª¨ ì¸í„°í˜ì´ìŠ¤ëŠ” ìì‹ ì¸í„°í˜ì´ìŠ¤ê°€ í˜¸ì¶œí•˜ì—¬ë„ ì´ˆê¸°í™” í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠëŠ”ë‹¤.

interface A {
    int A = 1;
    int AA = Main.out("AA", 2);
}
interface B extends A {
    int B = Main.out("B", 3);
    int BB = Main.out("BB", 4);
}
interface C extends B {
    int C = Main.out("C", 5);
    int CC = Main.out("CC", 6);
}
class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        System.out.println("B.A : " + B.A);
        System.out.println("C.B : " + C.B);
        System.out.println("C.C : " + C.C);
    }
    static int out(String s, int i) {
        System.out.println(s + " = " + i);
        return i;
    }
}
B.A : 1
B = 3
BB = 4
C.B : 3
C = 5
CC = 6
C.C : 5
